metadata.title: CVE-2024-50237 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:wifi: mac80211: do not pass a stopped vif to the driver in .get_txpowerAvoid potentially crashing in the driver because of uninitialized privatedata

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
